ape.title: Annotated Program Execution for lua interpreter

step.narrative: Program entry point in function main(). lua state is created.

lua lib entry point to new state creation: function luaL_newstate(). Calls internal function lua_newstate().
TODO: move to step: lauxlib.c:649 On return from lua_newstate(), all members of lua_State* L are 0 except for L->tt, which is initialized to LUA_TTHREAD
Calls lua_Alloc function, params user data ptr 'ud', 0, size of combined state objects lua_State L, global_state G.
